name: Mira and the Rabbit
description:
One day, Mira's friend went missing and upon investigating the library for clues she suddenly was sent to an unknown place. Can Mira find her friend and escape or will she be trapped there forever?

(Game isn't completely finished but I hope you enjoy playing! ^_^)

Note(s) to the players:

(We've noticed there is some uncommon problem with windows telling you not to download the game! Sorry about that, it's a unity executable.)

Controls:

(Highly recommended to view the journal's tabs and lore page to understand more of what's going on!)

WASD to move

E to interact

F to pick up items

I for inventory

J to open the journal

Esc to quit

Cheat-sheet if you get stuck! 

...

Programmed by Antreek Games

Art by Momo and Pixel Art by meido (aka) the Momei Doumei

Music by Mark Samani
